abstract: Exhibit Fashioning a Reign: 90 Years of Style From the Queen's Wardrobe, at Buckingham Palace in London, celebrates Queen Elizabeth II's 90th birthday by highlighting her clothes and roles they have payed in her duties as head of state.

headline.print_headline: More Than Pearls, a Bag and a Crown

keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
keywords.name: persons

keywords.value: Fashioning a Reign: 90 Years of Style From the Queen's Wardrobe (Exhibit)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: From her coronation dress to her hats, the largest exhibition of the royal clothing reveals the whys and wherefores of what the queen wears....
lead_paragraph: From her coronation dress to her hats, the largest exhibition of the royal clothing reveals the whys and wherefores of what the queen wears.
